alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; North Cass; South Cass; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 28 at 2:40PM CDT until May 28 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR VERY LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR ALL OF NORTH CENTRAL MINNESOTA AND PARTS OF NORTHEAST MINNESOTA... * AFFECTED AREA...Southern Lake, southern Cook, Cass and Crow Wing Counties. * WINDS...Southeast 10 to 15 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Around 80. * IMPACTS...Any fires may grow and spread quickly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; North Cass; South Cass; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
